briefdescription.para: Get Clock frequency for IP in common group.
Get Clock frequency for selected clock source.

simplesect.para: clock frequency for selected clock source

briefdescription.para: Get the IP clock source Note: This API return the direct clock source.
Get the IP clock divider Note:This API return the direct clock divider.

simplesect.para: status_success Setting ADC clock source is successful status_clk_invalid Invalid ADC clock status_clk_src_invalid Invalid ADC clock source

parameterdescription.para: Setting WDG clock source is successful
Invalid WDG or invalid clock source

briefdescription.para: Set the IP clock source and divider.

simplesect.para: status_success Setting Clock source and divider is successful. status_clk_src_invalid clock source is invalid. status_clk_fixed clock source and divider is a fixed value status_clk_shared_ahb Clock is shared with the AHB clock status_clk_shared_axi0 Clock is shared with the AXI0 clock status_clk_shared_axi1 CLock is shared with the AXI1 clock status_clk_shared_axi2 Clock is shared with the AXI2 clock status_clk_shared_cpu0 Clock is shared with the CPU0 clock status_clk_shared_cpu1 Clock is shared with the CPU1 clock
true if in group, false if not in group

briefdescription.para: Disconnect the clock group from specified CPU.

parameterdescription.para: clock group index, value value is 0/1/2/3

briefdescription.para: Disconnect the clock group from specified CPU.

parameterdescription.para: clock group index, value value is 0/1/2/3
